statements: SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhood_population_data;
SELECT population_count, neighborhood_name FROM neighborhood_population_data;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE population_count > 10000;
SELECT neighborhood_name FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE population_count < 5000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhood_population_data ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE neighborhood_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY population_count ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, population_count FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE neighborhood_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_population_data WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' AND population_count < 5000;
SELECT AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM neighborhood_population_data;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT region_name FROM city_regions WHERE neighborhood_id = 2;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_name LIKE '%Park%';
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;
SELECT n.neighborhood_name, cr.region_name FROM neighborhoods n INNER JOIN city_regions cr ON n.neighborhood_id = cr.neighborhood_id;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT AVG(population) AS average_population FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM households WHERE total_population > 100;
SELECT name, age FROM individuals ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, COUNT(household_id) AS num_households FROM households GROUP BY neighborhood_id;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM neighborhoods WHERE population > 1000;
SELECT household_id, COUNT(individual_id) AS num_individuals FROM individuals GROUP BY household_id HAVING num_individuals > 2 ORDER BY num_individuals DESC;

SELECT individuals.name, individuals.age, neighborhoods.neighborhood_name FROM individuals JOIN households ON individuals.household_id = households.household_id JOIN neighborhoods ON households.neighborhood_id = neighborhoods.neighborhood_id WHERE individuals.age > 30;

SELECT households.neighborhood_id, neighborhoods.neighborhood_name, SUM(individuals.age) AS total_age FROM individuals JOIN households ON individuals.household_id = households.household_id JOIN neighborhoods ON households.neighborhood_id = neighborhoods.neighborhood_id GROUP BY households.neighborhood_id ORDER BY total_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhoods WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT neighborhood_id, median_age, avg_income FROM demographic_data ORDER BY median_age DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, num_houses, avg_house_price FROM housing_data WHERE avg_house_price < 500000;
SELECT neighborhood_name, num_parks, num_restaurants FROM amenities_data WHERE num_parks > 5;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, avg_income FROM neighborhoods INNER JOIN demographic_data ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = demographic_data.neighborhood_id WHERE avg_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM housing_data ORDER BY avg_house_price ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT neighborhoods.neighborhood_name, amenities_data.num_parks, amenities_data.num_restaurants FROM neighborhoods INNER JOIN amenities_data ON neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = amenities_data.neighborhood_id;
SELECT * FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhoods ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT building_name, building_type FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Residential';
SELECT resident_name, age FROM residents WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT amenity_name, amenity_type FROM amenities WHERE amenity_type = 'Park';
SELECT neighborhood_name, population_count FROM neighborhoods;
SELECT street_name, neighborhood_id FROM streets ORDER BY street_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, building_type FROM buildings WHERE building_type = 'Residential';
SELECT resident_name, age FROM residents WHERE age > 30 AND resident_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT building_name, amenity_name, amenity_type FROM buildings b JOIN amenities a ON b.building_id = a.building_id WHERE amenity_type = 'Park' ORDER BY building_name ASC;
